DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Seeds are unplayable curse cards that will grow if cared for.
If the next attack this turn is fully blocked, the attacker takes the damage instead. If not, take double damage.
Attacks deal #b20% more damage, but you gain #b1 fewer [E] .
Yawns are Skill cards which grant #yBlock and #yExhaust.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
